Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-python3, pybuild-plugin-pyproject, python3-all, python3-dill (>= 0.3.9), python3-h5py <!nocheck>, python3-numpy <!nocheck>, python3-pox (>= 0.3.5), python3-setuptools, python3-sphinx <!nodoc>, python3-sphinx-notfound-page <!nodoc>, python3-sphinx-rtd-theme <!nodoc>, python3-sqlalchemy <!nocheck>
Description: Persistent caching to memory, disk or database klepto extends Python's lru_cache to utilise different keymaps and alternate caching algorithms.  This package also has archiving capabilities for longer-term storage.  It uses a simple dictionary-style interface for all caches and archives, and all caches can be applied to any Python function as a decorator. . klepto is intended to be used for distributed and parallel computing, where the keymaps serialize the stored objects, and the caches and archives are intended to be read/write accessible from different threads and processes. . klepto is part of pathos, a Python framework for heterogeneous computing.
Package-List: python-klepto-doc deb doc optional arch=all profile=!nodoc python3-klepto deb python optional arch=all
